steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"adal6","text":"Filter paper disc containing blood cut and placed into 1.5 mL EP tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4bdv4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"1E6A0D00E71B11E8844A77A7C52228D7","id":682406,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Lyse RBC"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"amdgo","text":"Centrifuge at 20,000 \u00d7 g for  , discard the supernatant with a micropipettor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":29,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"7o1n","text":"  until the DNA precipitate forms a white or pink gel-like pellet at the bottom of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4eu7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1ltnl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dmfq6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d1jck","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"42184790E71F11E8B3D97392DFE7A49C","duration":300,"label":"","step_guid":"2454CA70E71B11E8844A77A7C52228D7"}},{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"D3054A80E71C11E8844A77A7C52228D7","step_guid":"C0E18380E71E11E8B3D97392DFE7A49C","label":"","title":""}}],"guid":"2454CA70E71B11E8844A77A7C52228D7","id":682407,"previous_id":682415,"previous_guid":"EC3FCF00E71E11E8B3D97392DFE7A49C","section":"Precipitate the DNA and separate phases"}
